children.name: Discarded cuts added to the recipe(cooking with eggshells)
Not allowing to either heat or cool
Incorrect technique for application of oil/rolling of butter
Unsafe/incorrect placement of utensil (pan on stove, filter in mug)
Incorrect chopping/cutting technique(chopping instead of slicing)
Incorrect directionality(slicing parallel instead of perpendicular)
Incorrect assembling technique(assembling english muffin with wrong sides facing out)
Incorrect technique for pour/sprinkle(pouring salt instead of seasoning)
Incorrect number/count of ingredient used(2 mushrooms instead of 3)
Incorrect measurement of ingredient used(2 tsp instead of 1 tsp oil)
Incorrect size of ingredient used(8 inch tortilla instead of 14 inch)
Incorrect measurement of length(spread jam on tortilla leaving 0.5" edges)
Incorrect cooking temperature (Cooking on high heat)
Using hot water/oil instead of cold water/oil
Rinsing/thawing with hot water instead of cold water
